data.title: Johnson, Debois & Forrest Santa Rosa Structural Engineering
data.meta_description: Johnson DeBois & Forrest offers Structural Engineering services in Santa Rosa and to all surrounding areas.
data.text:
About JDF

Johnson, DeBois & Forrest was founded in 1991 by three partners (Kelly Johnson, Jeff DeBois & Mark Forrest) under the name of Johnson, DeBois & Associates. Since then, the company added to it's personnel, and changed it's name to Johnson DeBois & Forrest.

JDF is a mid-size firm, located in Santa Rosa, made up of licensed principal engineers, associate engineers, CAD drafters and administrative staff. We are unique in the engineering community because of our strong building code background

Get Started!

Johnson DeBois & Forrest is a Structural Engineering and Code Consulting Firm that provides structural support services for a wide range of projects such as:

Custom homes, subdivisions, apartments, additions and remodels

Commercial buildings for office, retail, warehouse, winery, church and hotel establishments

Barns, riding arenas and agricultural buildings, custom pools

Third party plan checking for life/safety and structural design

We make every effort to keep the lines of communication open with our clients. We know how overwhelming and intimidating the building process can be. We have found that a client who is more informed about building code requirements will be less likely to become frustrated during the design process. We work closely with Architects, Builders, Designers and Clients to ensure design continuity.

We are committed to providing the highest level of service and maintaining professional and friendly relationships with all of our clients.
